Notification.ToggleMacroCopiedToClipboar: Toggle macro text has been copied to the clipboard.
ConfigWindow.Title: Umbra Settings
BattleEffectsWidget.Title: Battle Effects Intensity
CompanionWidget.Tooltip:
Left-click:               Summon
Right-click:            Change stance
Shift-Right-click: Dismiss
Middle-click:        Open companion window
CurrencyWidget.Name: Currencies
LocationWidget.Tooltip:
Left-click:     Teleport
Right-click:  Remove flag marker
CVAR.General.LanguageOverride.Name: Language Override (Reloads the plugin)
CVAR.General.LanguageOverride.Descriptio: Overrides Dalamud's language setting for Umbra. Note that this only affects Umbra-specific translations. Texts that come from the game itself will still be shown in the game's language. Modifying this value will reload the plugin, causing the settings window to close.
CVAR.General.EnableImageProcessing.Name: Enable image processing on some icon elements
CVAR.General.EnableImageProcessing.Descr: Performs some image manipulation on some icons to improve their appearance. You may want to disable this if you have custom icon packs installed. Modifying this value will restart the plugin to invalidate caches. This causes the settings window to close itself.
CVAR.General.ShowInCutscenes.Name: Show Umbra elements in cutscenes
CVAR.General.ShowInGPose.Name: Show Umbra elements while GPose is active
CVAR.General.ShowOnUserHide.Name: Show Umbra elements when the UI is manually hidden
CVAR.General.ShowBetweenAreas.Name: Show Umbra elements during loading screens
CVAR.General.ShowDuringIdleCam.Name: Show Umbra elements during idle camera (AFK) mode
CVAR.Window.EnableClipping.Name: Enable window clipping
CVAR.Window.EnableClipping.Description: Allows windows to render behind native game windows. This may have a slight performance cost and may not work properly for all native game windows. Note that this feature does not work when Multi-monitor support is enabled in Dalamud settings.
CVAR.WindowManager.PlaySoundEffects.Name: Play sound effects
CVAR.WindowManager.PlaySoundEffects.Desc: If enabled, plays the default UI sound effects when opening and closing Umbra windows.
CVAR.WindowManager.HonorEscapeKey.Name: Allow pressing ESC to close focused windows
CVAR.WindowManager.HonorEscapeKey.Descri: Intercepts the escape key when an Umbra window is focused to close it.
CVAR.Toolbar.Enabled.Name: Enable the toolbar
CVAR.Toolbar.Enabled.Description: Whether to display the toolbar. Use the "/umbra" command to open the settings window if you decide to disable the toolbar.
CVAR.Toolbar.IsTopAligned.Name: Place the toolbar at the top of the screen.
CVAR.Toolbar.IsTopAligned.Description: Aligns the toolbar to the top of the screen rather than the bottom.
CVAR.Toolbar.ItemSpacing.Name: Toolbar widget spacing
CVAR.Toolbar.ItemSpacing.Description: Defines the distance between toolbar widgets in pixels.
CVAR.Toolbar.MarginLeft.Name: Toolbar left margin
CVAR.Toolbar.MarginLeft.Description: The distance between the left edge of the screen and the toolbar in pixels.
CVAR.Toolbar.MarginRight.Name: Toolbar right margin
CVAR.Toolbar.MarginRight.Description: The distance between the right edge of the screen and the toolbar in pixels.
CVAR.Toolbar.YOffset.Name: Toolbar vertical offset
CVAR.Toolbar.YOffset.Description: The vertical offset of the toolbar from the top or bottom of the screen in pixels.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.BattleEffects.Enable: Display a widget that allows you to control the visibility of various battle effects.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Clock.Enabled.Name: Show clock widget
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Clock.Enabled.Descri: Display a widget that shows the current Eorzea and local/server time. Local and server time can be toggled when clicked.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Clock.Vertical.Name: Stack the clocks vertically
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Clock.Vertical.Descr: Stacks the different clocks in the clocks-widget vertically instead of horizontally.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Companion.Enabled.De: Shows a chocobo companion widget that allows you to summon, dismiss and change the behavior of your companion.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Currencies.Enabled.D: Display a widget that shows a list of your currencies and can track one of your choice.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.DtrBar.Enabled.Name: Show server info bar entries from other plugins
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.DtrBar.Enabled.Descr: Display server info bar entries that originate from other plugins. Use Dalamud's 'Server Info Bar' settings to configure their order and visibility.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.DtrBar.UseTextColors: Use text colors from server info bar entries
If enabled, uses the text colors from server info bar entries for the toolbar widgets. Note that this may not always look good depending on the brightness of the toolbar background.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.DtrBar.HideNative.De: Hides the native server info bar for as long as the server info bar widget is enabled.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Flag.Enabled.Name: Show flag widget
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Flag.Enabled.Descrip: Display a widget that shows the current location of your flag, as well as an option to teleport to a nearby Aetheryte.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Gearset.Enabled.Name: Show gearset widget
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Gearset.Enabled.Desc: Display a widget that allows you to change your currently equipped gearset.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Gearset.UseAlternate: Use alternate job icon for gearset switcher widget header
If enabled, uses an alternate icon for the gearset switcher dropdown header. This may be useful if you are using custom icon packs.
Use alternate job icons for the gearset switcher buttons
If enabled, uses alternate icons for the buttons of gearset switcher widget. This may be useful if you are using custom icon packs.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Location.Enabled.Des: Display a widget that shows your current location and weather. Clicking the widget shows the weather forecast for the next couple of hours in your current location.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Location.ItemSpacing: Item spacing between location and weather

Defines the distance between the location and weather elements in the location widget in pixels. This may useful for if you have the toolbar located at the top of the screen and have webcam clamp on top of the monitor that overlaps the widget.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.MailIndicator.Enable: Display a widget that shows up when you have one or more unread messages waiting for you.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.MainMenu.Enabled.Des: Display a widget that shows the main menu as separate menus.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.MainMenu.ShowIcons.N: Show game icons in main menu items
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.MainMenu.ShowIcons.D: Display the game icons next to the main menu items.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.MainMenu.ShowMainIco: Show main menu buttons as icons instead of text
Note that the official MainCommand-bar uses a single texture for its icons, while Umbra uses regular icons. The result may look inconsistent because of this.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.MainMenu.Travel.Show: Show residential areas in the travel menu
Display the available residential areas in the travel menu. These items are only enabled when you are on your home world.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Volume.Enabled.Name: Show volume widget
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.Volume.Enabled.Descr: Display a widget that allows you to control the various audio volumes of the game.
CVAR.Toolbar.Widget.WorldMarkerMenu.Enab: Display a widget that allows you to quickly toggle your activated world markers.
CVAR.Markers.Direction.Enabled.Name: Show direction markers
CVAR.Markers.Direction.Enabled.Descripti: Display direction indicators of world markers that are currently out of view.
CVAR.Markers.Direction.Radius.Name: Direction indicator edge padding
CVAR.Markers.Direction.Radius.Descriptio: The padding from the edge of the screen in pixels to display the direction indicators.
CVAR.Markers.Direction.UseCircularPositi: Use circular positioning for direction markers
If enabled, direction markers are positioned based on the screen height only, making them appear in a circle around the center of the screen.
CVAR.Markers.OcclusionTest.Enabled.Name: Enable occlusion testing
CVAR.Markers.OcclusionTest.Enabled.Descr: If enabled, the visibility of world markers is tested against the game's occlusion system to make markers slightly transparent when not in direct line of sight. This may have a slight performance cost and may not work for all world objects.
CVAR.Markers.DistanceOpacity.Enabled.Des: If enabled, the opacity of world markers is adjusted based on the distance to the marker. The actual fading distances are controlled by the marker types themselves.
CVAR.Markers.MarkerIconScaleFactor.Name: World marker icon scale factor (percent)
CVAR.Markers.MarkerIconScaleFactor.Descr: The scale factor of world marker icons. This value is a percentage of the default size and works in addition to the global font scaling setting.
CVAR.Markers.DirectionIconScaleFactor.De: The scale factor of direction indicator icons. This value is a percentage of the default size and works in addition to the global font scaling setting.
CVAR.Markers.EurekaCoffers.Enabled.Name: Show Eureka coffer markers
CVAR.Markers.EurekaCoffers.Enabled.Descr: Shows possible Eureka Bunny Coffers after using the Lucky Carrot. Which coffers are shown is based on your location and the text that appears after using the lucky carrot.
CVAR.Markers.EurekaCoffers.AddMapMarkers: Add map markers for detected Eureka coffers

Adds map markers for detected Eureka Bunny Coffer locations. Note that this feature is unavailable if the Eureka Linker plugin is also installed and enabled, since it also provides similar functionality.
CVAR.Markers.Fate.Enabled.Name: Show FATE markers
CVAR.Markers.Fate.Enabled.Description: Shows world markers for FATEs in the current zone.
CVAR.Markers.Flag.Enabled.Name: Show flag marker
CVAR.Markers.Flag.Enabled.Description: Shows a world marker for the flag location in the current zone.
CVAR.Markers.Hunt.Enabled.Name: Show hunt markers
CVAR.Markers.Hunt.Enabled.Description: Shows world markers for hunt mobs (SS/S/A/B/C) in the current zone. Note that only S-marks are always visible, but lower marks require you to be close by.
CVAR.Markers.GatheringNodes.Enabled.Name: Show gathering node markers
CVAR.Markers.GatheringNodes.Enabled.Desc: Shows world markers for gathering nodes around you if your current job is one of the gatherer jobs.
CVAR.Markers.Quest.Enabled.Name: Show quest markers
CVAR.Markers.Quest.Enabled.Description: Shows world markers for current quest objectives.
CVAR.Markers.TripleTriad.Enabled.Name: Show unobtained Triple Triad card markers
CVAR.Markers.TripleTriad.Enabled.Descrip: Shows world markers for Triple Triad cards that you have not yet obtained.
CVAR.Markers.TripleTriad.ShowLockedCards: Show Triple Triad card markers for locked cards
Shows world markers for Triple Triad cards that are locked behind unfinished quests.
ThemeColor.Background.Name: Background
ThemeColor.Background.Description: The background color of common elements.
ThemeColor.BackgroundLight.Name: Background Light
ThemeColor.BackgroundLight.Description: A lighter variant of the background color, typically used for gradients.
ThemeColor.BackgroundDark.Name: Background Dark
ThemeColor.BackgroundDark.Description: A darker variant of the background color, typically buttons and frames.
ThemeColor.BackgroundActive.Name: Background Active
ThemeColor.BackgroundActive.Description: A background color used to indicate active elements, such as pressed buttons.
ThemeColor.Border.Name: Borders
ThemeColor.Border.Description: The color of default borders around elements.
ThemeColor.BorderDark.Name: Dark Borders
ThemeColor.BorderDark.Description: A darker variant of the border color, typically used for button outlines.
ThemeColor.BorderLight.Name: Light Borders
ThemeColor.BorderLight.Description: A lighter variant of the border color, typically used for inner borders.
ThemeColor.Text.Name: Text
ThemeColor.TextLight.Name: Active Text
ThemeColor.TextLight.Description: A lighter variant of the text color, typically used for active elements, hover states, etc.
ThemeColor.TextMuted.Name: Muted Text
ThemeColor.TextMuted.Description: A muted variant of the text color, typically used for secondary or disabled elements.
ThemeColor.TextOutline.Name: Text Outline
ThemeColor.TextOutline.Description: The color of the outline around text.
ThemeColor.TextOutlineLight.Name: Text Outline (Bright)
ThemeColor.TextOutlineLight.Description: A variant of the text outline color that is typically used for brighter text.
ThemeColor.HighlightBackground.Name: Highlight Background
ThemeColor.HighlightBackground.Descripti: The background color of highlighted elements, such as hovered dropdown buttons.
ThemeColor.HighlightForeground.Name: Highlight Foreground
ThemeColor.HighlightForeground.Descripti: The text color of highlighted elements.
ThemeColor.HighlightOutline.Name: Highlight Text Outline
ThemeColor.HighlightOutline.Description: The color of the outline around highlighted text.
ThemeColor.Accent.Name: Accent Color
ThemeColor.Accent.Description: The accent color used in some elements.
ThemeColor.ToolbarLight.Name: Light Toolbar Color
ThemeColor.ToolbarLight.Description: The light color variant of the gradient that is used in the toolbar.
ThemeColor.ToolbarDark.Name: Dark Toolbar Color
ThemeColor.ToolbarDark.Description: The dark color variant of the gradient that is used in the toolbar.
